game.name: HER TREES : PUZZLE DREAM
game.categories: Single-player, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: HER TREES : PUZZLE DREAM은 물체를 움직이고 결합하여 퍼즐을 푸는 독특한 포인트 앤 클릭 퍼즐 게임입니다.꿈 속에 숨어 있는 기묘한 퍼즐을 풀어보세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: HER TREES : PUZZLE DREAM is a unique point-and-click puzzle game where you move and combine objects to solve puzzles. Unravel the strange puzzles hidden in your dreams.
